description: This file defines the StringVariable class, a specialized implementation of a base variable class for handling string variables in a code generation context, supporting encoding/decoding for C and Java, and integrating with JSON and cJSON libraries.

classes.name: StringVariable
classes.description: A class representing a string-type variable with methods for encoding, decoding, and type information, tailored for code generation in C and Java.

methods.name: resolveReferences
methods.description: Overrides the base method; currently does nothing.

methods.name: isPtr
methods.description: Indicates that the variable is a pointer type.

methods.name: isString
methods.description: Indicates that the variable is a string type.

methods.name: getJsonKey
methods.description: Provides the JSON key mapping for the string variable.

methods.name: setDoubleDeref
methods.description: Sets the flag to enable double dereferencing during native decoding.

methods.name: getNativeEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code lines for encoding the string variable into JSON.

methods.name: getNativeDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates C code lines for decoding the string variable from JSON.

methods.name: getJavaEncodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code lines for encoding the string variable into a JSON object.

methods.name: getJavaDecodeLines
methods.description: Generates Java code lines for decoding the string variable from a JSON object.

methods.name: getJavaIpcObjectType
methods.description: Returns the IPC object type for Java, 'StringIPC'.
